wikipedia_page.main: Charles Henry Leicester Stanhope, 12th Earl of Harrington (born 20 July 1945), styled as Viscount Petersham from birth until his father's death in 2009, is the son of William Stanhope, 11th Earl of Harrington, and his wife, Eileen Grey.

link_mentions.page: List of earls in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: *Charles Stanhope, 12th Earl of Harrington, (born 1945), 210th in the Sunday Times Rich List 2004
